content: Hey @everyone , it looks like both me (@pnkfelix ) and @nikomatsakis are not able to attend the weekly meeting today. If someone else would like to take a shot at running the meeting that'd be great. Otherwise, the meeting is effectively cancelled.
@pnkfelix we could try but what would be a desirable output from a meeting without you?
I'd do it but I don't have a top level perspective of most of the things that people are working on :)

I suppose the main desirable output(s) are 1. progress reports (which admittedly do not need a live meeting), including identification of road blocks, and 2. potential mutual assistance in removing those road blocks.
But having said that, I certainly can appreciate the idea that its simpler to just ask people to post status reports into the usual Paper document
(and not expect anyone to allocate dedicated time today for the regular meeting)
I've added a section to the Paper doc for this week that we can add status updates to.
